abstract: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, said its first-quarter profits were “well ahead” of last year, swelled by record results in its investment bank arm and gains on the value of its own debt.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings, Europe’s biggest bank, said its first-quarter profits were “well ahead” of last year, swelled by record results in its investment bank arm and gains on the value of its own debt.

headline.main: HSBC Says First-Quarter Profit Is Up
